posts.post_content:
The following T205's are for sale.  PP friends and family, please add $3 for shipping, they will be sent USPS first class.  First to say I'll take it gets it with the exception of the few cards I would like to field offers on.  I will confirm purchases prior to funds being sent.  Please use pm's for purchases and scan requests to [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url].  Thanks for looking.  Bob I.

Mordecai Brown – Sweet Caporal PSA 2 - $Sold
